name: Bootstrap
description: Generate task specifications from project goal

tasks.name: Generate Task Specifications
tasks.description: Read GOAL.md and create a complete set of task specification files that break down the project into atomic, actionable tasks. Analyze the goal, identify logical phases, and create detailed tasks with dependencies. You decide what phases and tasks are needed based on the goal.
acceptance_criteria: Identify logical phases based on the project requirements
Create phase-XX-name.json files for each phase
Each task is atomic (completable in one iteration)
Each task has clear acceptance criteria
Dependencies form a valid DAG (no cycles)
Update summary.json with all phases and task counts
Reference schema.json for the required JSON format
